name: Giant Water Scorpion
description: A large scorpion that thrives in water, equipped with natural armor and a deadly proboscis.
memorable: Its ability to inject poison and reduce the Strength of its prey makes it a lethal ambush predator.
goals: To hunt and ambush prey in its aquatic habitat.
relations: May be encountered in areas populated by other aquatic beasts.
environment: Aquatic environments such as lakes, rivers, and swamps.
strengths: Good mobility in water and the ability to deal significant damage through its poisonous attacks.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence, limiting its tactical capabilities.
attacks: Multiattack with claws and a dangerous proboscis that can severely weaken foes.
most_powerful_ability: Poison Injection, which deals extra poison damage and can reduce the Strength of its targets.
senses: Blindsight allows it to sense its surroundings without sight, adding to its stealthy predatory nature.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, enhancing its ability to ambush prey underwater.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for up to one hour.
Uses its tail as a breathing tube while swimming.
Advantage on stealth checks underwater due to underwater camouflage.
Grapples smaller foes, hindering their movements.
Can kill targets by reducing their Strength to zero.
test_queries: monster that can drown its prey
